com.core.adnsdk

Class NativeAdAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.core.adnsdk.NativeAdAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class NativeAdAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    NativeAdAdapter is used to create Banner, Card views for ListView. Default renderer view type is AdViewType.CARD_VIDEO.

    It would not load another ad when current ad was watched by default, user could use AdPoolListener.onAdWatched(int) callback to notify SDK to load another ad when current ad was watched.

    Since:
    2016-04-18
